extendedInfo.description: Science becomes entertaining when it is represented in the form of a game. Now we have developed a real stunning android science games app that help you discover various science games online right though your mobile device.Following are some of the noted features of this amazing app.â¢	Many updated information on various cooking games are provided in the app.â¢	Many blogs, articles related to science games for grade 6, science games for kids etc are linked directly to the app.â¢	The app provides you with video and picture presentation on various science classroom games.DISCLAIMER: The content provided in this app is collected using Feeds and Videos are hosted by YouTube and all are available in public domain. We have not uploaded any videos to YouTube. Apps are fetching the data from RSS feeds of different sites.This app provides an organized way to browse, read contents and watch YouTube Videos.
